wiki.content:
"Kiss You" is a song by English-Irish boy band One Direction, taken from their second studio album, Take Me Home (2012). The track was written by Kristoffer Fogelmark, Kristian Lundin, Albin Nedler, Rami Yacoub, Savan Kotecha and Carl Falk, and produced by Yacoub and Falk. "Kiss You" was chosen as the second single from the album in the United States, and the third single internationally. The single will be released on February 8, 2013.[1] The music video for "Kiss You" was directed by Vaughan Arnell. Arnell had previously directed One Direction's music videos for "Live While We're Young" and "Little Things". Band member Zayn Malik proclaimed the concept behind the music video "bigger than anything" the group have done before.

"Kiss You" was chosen as the second single from the album in the United States, and the third single internationally. The single will be released on February 8, 2013.
